caseTitle: Muhammad  Raqeeb v. Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa thr. its Chief Secretary, Peshawar & others
tagline: Discussion on the definition of employee under Section 2 (b) and Section 3 of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Employees (Regularization of Services) Act, 2009. (2) Doctrine of estoppel, finality and res judicata.
